(?:^|/)Assets/
^\.github/workflows/
^\Q.github/action/spelling/excludes.txt\E$
^\Q.github/actions/spelling/expect.txt\E$
^\Q.github/actions/spelling/patterns.txt\E$
^\Q.nojekyll\E$
^\Q.well-known/discord\E$
^\QBlog/Posts/help.md.bin\E$
(?:^|/)tools/
\.css
\.js
\.html
\.mjs
^\Qpre-commit install --hook-type post-commit\E$
